tweet: Just in case your donation to a journalist is not something you want publicly visible in a blockchain: we have removed Bitcoin as a donation option.   https://t.co/SKNIXlRoex is now Monero-only to protect our donors from blockchain misinterpretation/pseudo-analysis.

Sad news today. With heavy hearts we are announcing that the  https://t.co/X4xyFNTw61 service will no longer be operated. #JobDone #LongLiveMonero  Read our blog post:  https://t.co/ravxmZefsE

We have seen a 100% increase of iOS downloads this month in comparison to December - which tells us that #Monero adoption is growing strong! 🔥  Almost 80,000 CakeWallet users & counting!   As always, privacy is complicated, we make it Cake. ➡️  https://t.co/lHixKCTzXc 🧁 $XMR
Unlike privacy coins like Monero, every bitcoin transaction can be traced to its point of origin.

I've extensively researched more than 100 projects in crypto - and HODL'd many since the 2017 bull run  The only ones that I just can't get out of my head are $NANO and $XMR  They have the greatest asymmetrical risk/reward ratio of any assets the world has ever seen

Sad to let go this wonderful 6y old. But I know #Monero adoption keeps growing, allowing ever-more transactions without intermediaries. Proud to have set the bar so high for trust and honesty, all too rare in cryptoland. Confident the #Monero ecosystem will carry that torch high.
